Title: The Girl with All the Gifts
Genre: Action, Adventure, Drama, Horror, Sci-Fi, Thriller
Actors: Sennia Nanua, Fisayo Akinade, Dominique Tipper, Paddy Considine
Plot: A scientist and a teacher living in a dystopian future embark on a journey of survival with a special young girl named Melanie.
Awards: Nominated for 1 BAFTA Film Award. Another 8 wins & 10 nominations.
Production: Poison Chef, Altitude Film Entertainment, BFI Film Fund
